## Pre-requisites

### Intel MKL
- Install BLAS/MKL from (https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/developer/tools/oneapi/onemkl-download.html)

### Windows
- Rtools for Windows (https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/)

### MacOS
- Ensure that xcode command line tools are installed. Open Terminal and type: `xcode-select -p`. 
  - If you see the following: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools
  command line tools are installed
  - If not, check for system updates: `System Settings > General > Software Update`
- Install the latest gfortran compiler (https://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/tools/)

## Install FastReg
```r
install.packages(c("Rcpp", "RcppArmadillo", "stats", "data.table", "BiocManager"))
Biocmanager::install("rhdf5")
library(devtools)
install_github("SciomeLLC/FastReg")
```
